name: Lesang Moore
description: I know that even the simplest things are so much better when shared with someone special! I want to find my most trusted friend, my sensual ardent lover, my compatible sharing companion. Someone authentic, optimistic, with some shared interests/attitudes/values. Able to come together on the same level with most things. Spontaneously affectionate, loving and fun loving; who also craves that special lover’s intimacy
